channel.title: Certification on dubell.io

item.title: My OSCP Review
item.description: In this blog post I’ll write about my experience taking the OSCP certification as well as some recommendations for people wanting to take the exam. I got access to the OSCP lab network 2019-09-09 and lost access 2019-12-08. As you can see I chose 90 days of lab time. The number one thing I read in all the OSCP reviews out there was that do not underestimate the amount of time it takes to be successful in the lab network.
